content:
The Request Statement Copies service process allows customers to request statement copies for their financial accounts. They can choose to receive them via email or post.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited Editions where Financial Services Cloud is enabled.

Use the Service Process Studio to enable the Request Statement Copies service process. Your agents can capture and submit a request through the Request Statement Copies OmniScript. A case is then created in Salesforce.
title: Configure Request Statement Copies Service Process
